original_title: Le Bruit de l'eau, le gris du parking - le vert
overview: There is a parking lot, a stadium. A wood and men. The Ardèche river flows. Habits, appointments and messages on the trees. Patrick, his voices, his fingers. Christian, his flowers. The water crosses then the stone, the green. There is, there is, there is.
title: Le Bruit de l'eau, le gris du parking - le vert
